idea:
HealthTech aims to reach out to healthcare practitioners planning to start their own practices or already running their own practice to assist them in delivering quality standardized services through successful practice management techniques. The platform aims to empower them to grow their business by creating value for the doctor. The key offerings will enhance their efficiency in Practice management, continuing education & skilling, efficient management of purchases of product & services and easing the availability of Capital. To start off with Healthtech is focussing on the Dental ecosystem.

To make Dental care affordable and accessible to the common man the industry needs huge ingestion of efficiency in the dental ecosystem – dentist and the associates, dental colleges and their students, equipment manufacturer, laboratories and other aligned businesses. HealthTech aims to solve this for the dental ecosystem

The dental ecosystem has presently several organizations working independently solving for only one use case like online ordering, easy access to training material, etc. However our experience suggests that these platforms cannot be run independently and need a platform bringing all the stakeholders onto a single platform. Our innovation lies is achieving this. Some of the use cases of this can be seen in the Patient Management module integrated with our lab-ordering platform to directly order implants, crowns, bridges, etc from the lab customized to the patient; the patient scheduling module integrated with the e-commerce platform initiating orders of consumables for doctors when there is a heavy flow of patients and many such other use cases
name: HEALTHTECH SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Vecino is in the business of empowering fitness from home by offering a complete solution that includes equipment, expert coaching and a virtual community experience.


It operates through an Innovative platform that aims to enable every Indian to become fitter, healthier and happier by bringing the concept of a home gym.


For a low monthly subscription, it offers the best in class equipment to your home (rental model), provide expert coaching advice through a state-of-the-art mobile app and provide the motivation by connecting you virtually to your friends and family. In addition, it also provides the necessary tools such as music, nutrition guidance. We aim to promote the talent and knowledge of Indian fitness trainers from different parts to the wider audience through our technology and equipment. 

Vecino's objective is to give high quality gym experience without incurring huge capex for users which enables offering service at a lower cost.
name: VECINO FITNESS PRIVATE LIMITED
